original_title: ACLU compares Fort Bliss detention center to WWII internment camps | Fox News
article_summary: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem criticizes Illinois leaders for their handling of criminal illegal immigrants, while the ACLU compares ICE detention centers to internment camps during World War II, a comparison DHS dismisses as deranged and lazy. The ACLU also opposes the use of Fort Bliss as a detention center for immigrants, citing it as a "shameful chapter" in the base's history.</s>
